body.name: JoyJolt JoyFul 24pc(12 Airtight, Freezer Safe Food Storage Containers and 12 Lids), Pantry Kitchen Storage Containers, Glass Meal Prep Container for Lunch, Glass Storage Containers with Lids
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 50 mins
features: Glass Food Storage Containers for Everything! Aside from the obvious fact that JoyFul by JoyJolt glass meal prep containers are healthier for you and your food, you can also go from freezer to oven without breaking, with a variety of shapes and sizes to fit your purpose. What a JoyFul Idea!

12 Airtight Food Storage Containers With Lids: Includes Four Rectangle Containers 35oz (8x6in), 21oz (6.75x5in), 12oz (two 4.2x5.5in). 4 Square Containers 27oz (6in), 17.5oz (5.2in), 11oz (two 4.3in). 4 Round Containers 32oz (6.75in). 21oz (5.9in), 13.5oz (two 5.2in). Height ranges from 1.75-2.3 inches.

All Temp Food Containers: Made from Borosilicate Glass (aka, space shuttle glass), your containers are robust and love extremes! They’re Dishwasher Safe, Oven Safe to 1040DegF and Microwave Safe containers (*NOT THE LIDS). Both lids and containers are fridge safe and Freezer Safe to minus 104DegF

Airtight Containers For Fresher Food: The airtight silicone seal and secure hinge clips means you can use them for a food container without odors and air, getting in or out! They're also leakproof glass lunch containers so go ahead and use them as soup containers in your lunch bag without fear!

JoyFul (by JoyJolt) glass tupperware will arrive securely gift boxed like all JoyJolt Glassware and comes with our robust 12-Month Warranty. So contact us if anything goes wrong, ok? And whether you’re using them for lunch or leftover we only have one rule - Live JoyFul and Cook for Joy!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Robust, Airtight, Temperature Tough AND Different Shapes! … What More Could You Want?! We can’t tell you what size food you’re making, or whether you have tons of leftovers or just a few, so instead of boxing you into a one-size-fits-all container set, this one comes with 9 different shapes and sizes (12 containers in all) made from robust Borosilicate Glass! From Freezer To Oven, And Back Again… Store airtight leftovers, freeze them down and thaw them out in the oven! And if you forgot that you were being treated out to lunch, you can stash your uneaten meal prep for later, all with airtight AND leakproof protection! And when you’re done, pop them in the dishwasher ready for the next batch of food. What a JoyFul Idea!

Move Over Plastic, This Sturdy Glassware Has A Long Joyous Future For The Pantry We all wish life could be a neat and tidy row of matching jars and cute labels, but not all kitchens are made that way! But with this different sized and shape set you can still have matching airtight pantry storage that fits your unique space From Freezer to Oven Made from the same glass used on the Space Shuttle (Borosilicate Glass), they’re fridge and freezer safe down to minus 104DegF, oven safe up to 1040DegF and microwave safe! Lids are not oven or microwave safe, but they ARE fridge and freezer safe. Easy To Clean Because these Dishwasher Safe containers are made from such robust glass, you’ll be able to wash them without chips or cracks appearing out of the blue. And you want to preserve the hermetic seal for a long time, so wash lids by hand. The Freshest Leftovers Food is hermetically sealed with our silicone gasket, and hinge-clip airtight latches. From odors to air, or things leaking from the shelf above, nothing is getting in or out of your containers. They’re also 100% Leakproof if using them for soup!

JoyFul, by JoyJolt 12pc Glass Food Container Set. · 12 Borosilicate Glass Containers with Airtight Lids. · Rectangle Sizes: 35oz (8x6”), 21oz (6.75x5”), 2x12oz (4.2x5.5”). · Square Sizes:27oz (6”), 17.5oz (5.2”), 2x11oz (4.3in) · Round Sizes: 32oz (6.75”), 21oz (5.9”), 2x13.5oz (5.2in). · Airtight, Leakproof, Hermetically Sealed Plastic Lids · Easy To Clean:Dishwasher Safe Containers / Handwash Lids · Temperatures: From -104DegF to 1040DegF · Oven and Microwave Safe (Containers Only), · Freezer Safe (Lids + Containers) · Gift Boxed with Secure Padding

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing!!!
reviews.reviewText: Great dishes for storage, pretty enough for the table, leak proof tops, easy to clean. . . need I say more. I love the different shapes and sizes. I pack my lunch daily. I no longer worry about soups leaking everywhere. Lid keeps the liquid in side the dish. Pop lid off and slide glass into microwave. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, safe storage
reviews.reviewText: Product was well packaged and arrived in good condition. good thick glass and impressive lids. The lid "keepers" are hinged so they should last a good while. The only down side is there are 9 (nine) lid and storage container sizes, so with the hinged keepers, you have a sizable storage situation .So with plastic microparticles sluffing off with those containers I'm reading about, these containers fill the bill pretty good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you’re wanting glass and sturdy lids
reviews.reviewText: One day I decided to throw all my plastic Tupperware away and go with glass. I went with these and couldn’t be happier. The glass is very resilient and thick. Lids seal very well. Also the sizes and shapes are perfect for every dish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High quality, wish there were larger sizes
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to replace my traditional plastic leftover dishes with glass because I'm tired of having stained, scratched containers. These had solid reviews, so I ordered them.Pros:✅ Thick glass that feels sturdy and can go from refrigerator to microwave.✅ No food staining✅ Lids go on easily - I didn't have any problems like other people✅ Dishwasher safe - I was a little worried about the lids, thinking that the snap handles hanging down in my dishwasher might break, but so far I haven't had any issues.Cons:❌ Wish there were larger sizes as well. Especially for a family, a lot of meal leftovers wouldn't fit in one container.During Thanksgiving, my dad was eating leftovers out of one of the dishes and like them so much he asked me to order him some.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for leftovers/lunches
reviews.reviewText: I love that these can be nested when not using and storing and I love how sturdy they feel. I have not had any leak issues and I am very pleased at how well they keep foods fresh. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: One lid arrived broken. They reached out to me to see if we liked the product before I could contact them through Amazon. No issues asking for a replacement and it arrived fast. Containers also work great and have no problems with leaks or using in microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I am loving these storage containers the more I use them. Both the containers and the lids are machine washable and hold up well. The lids hold very tightly and are perfect for fridge or freezer. I have used the large containers in the oven up to 450° and they’ve shown no sign of cracking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am trying to replace all of our plastic containers with glass. Its a slow process, so this was the first batch of glassware that I purchased. These are great. Super easy to clan (dishwasher safe!) and they seal really welll. I often toss my breakfast oatmel straigh tinto my bag and have no worries. I do wish that the sets came in different sizes. I live in a small apartment and I wasn't thinking when I ordered this set because the three shapes do not nestle within each other, which takes up more cabinet space. I need the brand to come out with matching sets in more sizes!

We were needing more storage dishes and these work great! They are a bit smaller but that's ok as they compliment some of our other larger ones. The lids clip on easily unlike some other brands. They also stack nicely to save space and the lids fit well together especially as the clips lay flat.

Muy buen producto, buena calidad. Me encanta que las tapas sean de bisagra, tengo unos que no tienen tapa de bisagra y ya varias se han roto. Mi refrigerador se ve ordenado. Parece que son de poca capacidad, pero son profundos. No he tenido problema, todo cabe bien. Los recomiendo mucho, además el precio es muy accesible en comparación con otros.

reviews.reviewTitle: Value for money and a good product
reviews.reviewText: I loved that containers leak proof and fridge to microwave. Fantastic product. Would recomend them. Price great
These are great and well made. The lid clips seem to be well made so I'm not afraid they will break/snap off over time.
Varios tamaños muy cómodos, de buena calidad y fáciles de cerrar. Voy a comprar otro set igual
